backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister logic for managing complaints, including submission, retrieval, authorization checks, storage mixins, and priority scoring.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic that adds an afterPhotoId field to existing complaints and transforms old actor state into the new format.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in authentication, complaint handling, UI components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color system for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root React application.
frontend/README.md: Setup guide explaining prerequisites and steps for running the Civic Lens frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routing, authentication state, password verification modal logic, and renders the root application layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling login state, logout flow, and password verification reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Password verification modal that submits a password and handles loading and validation errors.
Defines props for the ProfileSetupModal component.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInOptio: Renders Google and Apple sign‑in buttons using Internet Identity login with loading handling and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Befor: Displays before/after complaint photos with loading, error states, and status‑based badges.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Compl: Shows complaint metadata including priority, SLA, timestamps, location, and reporter info.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Escal: Displays an escalation badge showing how long ago a complaint was escalated.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Photo: Image uploader with preview, validation for file type/size, and remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Prior: Shows a priority badge with variant, icon, and label based on urgency level.
frontend/src/components/complaints/SlaBa: Displays remaining SLA time or an overdue badge based on due date and status.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Resolut: Feedback form allowing users to confirm resolution, give a rating, and submit comments.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, authentication state checks, and responsive menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordVerificati: Tracks password verification state in sessionStorage with sync across tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend API calls (complaints, roles, submissions, status updates) using React Query and the actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining global styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/MyReportsPage: Displays the user's submitted complaints with loading, empty, and list states, including status, priority, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/SubmitComplai: Provides a complaint submission form with authentication checks, photo upload, and mutation to create a new complaint.
frontend/src/pages/complaints/ComplaintD: Shows detailed complaint information with photos, admin status update actions, and support for after-photo uploads.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Renders project documentation with prerequisites and setup steps using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, sign‑in options, and a workflow overview for reporting civic issues.
frontend/src/pages/official/HigherOffici: Lists escalated complaints for higher officials with permission checks and quick access to complaint details.
frontend/src/pages/official/OfficialDash: Admin dashboard for managing open and in‑progress complaints with tabbed filtering and SLA indicators.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session‑persisted parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing Civic Lens features, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the civic‑issue reporting system.
